title: Excellent location! 3 Beds + 1 Baths for rent that has been updated!
posting_body: This beautifully painted 3 bedroom/1 bath unit is not to be missed.
The home cook who likes a dip in the tub will be enticed by the newly renovated kitchen and bath.
The eat-in kitchen features quartz countertops as well as modern equipment such as a refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, and stove.
The front load washer and dryer in the in-unit laundry area are great for tenants who don't have time to go to the laundromat.
New wood-look laminate flooring is both comfortable to walk on and easy to keep clean.
Enjoy living among small stores, coffee shops, bakeries, and fitness centers.
This property is securely walled and has secure parking, as well as a security alarm that is serviced by the landlord.
